alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 01 at 2:31AM MST until December 04 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches possible. Winds could gust 25 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Jackson Hole. * WHEN...From 11 AM Saturday through 11 AM Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel over open areas of Grand Teton National Park and locations south and west of Jackson could be impacted by the combination of snow and wind. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected to fall over the northern half of Grand Teton National Park. Total snowfall around the town of Jackson could range from 5 to 9 inches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
